title: On the road again
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Military life
abstract: "I misjudged a turn. Instead of going straight on, I turned sharply left and rolled my jeep."
description: In 1942, Bill joined the army, taking his brothers place who returned home to work on the farm. Bill worked in many capacities as a driver and instructor. Having a severe driving accident on a mission, Bill landed in hospital for three months with a fractured spine. Making a good recovery, he was able to return to service.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002737; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [St Arnaud Veterans]; Active; 2011
